title: Morning Stretch
description: A gentle full-body stretch to wake up after Fajr. Helps with blood flow without breaking your fast.
tip: Do this after Fajr prayer before sitting down. Even 5 minutes makes a difference.

title: Taraweeh Active Rest
description: Taraweeh itself is physical worship. Standing, bowing, and prostrating repeatedly engages your core, legs, and back.
exercises: Focus on proper posture in each position
tip: Consider Taraweeh your evening movement. You don't always need a separate workout on these nights.
